mm1.title: Mega Man 1
mm1.description: Mega Man 1 is where the series all started. It introduced many series staples such as choosing the order you complete stages in, gaining abilities from the robot masters you defeat, and a rock-paper-scissors style weapons system.
newFeatures: Introducing Mega Man, Dr. Wily, Dr. Light, and Roll
Classic Mega Man run, jump, and shoot gameplay
Non-linear stage select
Gain a weapon from each main boss defeated
Rock-Paper-Scissors style weapon system against bosses
First and only appearance of the magnet beam
First and only appearance of a points system
Only game with 6 rather than 8 Robot Masters
